Semester I

				Part-I English-I 
				Part-II Tamil-I 
				Part-III Core Paper-I:Social Work Prefession 
				Part-III Core Paper-II:Field Work-I 
				Part-III Allied Paper-I:Sociology and Its relevance for Social Work 
				Part-IV Soft Skills I-Essential of Lang and Comm Level I 
				Non-major Electives


Semester II

				Part-I Tamil-II 
				Part-II English-II 
				Part-III Core Paper-I: Basic Intervention Process and Techniques 
				Part-III Core Paper-IV: Field Work-II 
				Part-III Allied-II: Human Growth and Development 
				Part-IV Soft Skill I-Essential of Lang and Comm Level II 
				Non-major Electives
